title: WTB: T206 red portrait cobb PSA 2-3

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 red portrait cobb PSA 2-3
posts.post_content:
Looking to pick up a PSA 2-3 red portrait Cobb.

Centered PSA 2 sold on ebay for $4500ish and a 3 did $6k.

I have no problem paying these prices for a centered solid copy of each grade.

pics to [url]notfast1@gmail.com[/url] 

Thanks
